org.apache.spark.streaming.scheduler

Class JobGenerator

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.streaming.scheduler.JobGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logging

    public class JobGenerator
extends Object
implements Logging
    This class generates jobs from DStreams as well as drives checkpointing and cleaning up DStream metadata.

    • Method Detail

      • clock

        public Clock clock()

      • start

        public void start()
        Start generation of jobs

      • stop

        public void stop(boolean processReceivedData)
        Stop generation of jobs. processReceivedData = true makes this wait until jobs of current ongoing time interval has been generated, processed and corresponding checkpoints written.

      • onBatchCompletion

        public void onBatchCompletion(Time time)
        Callback called when a batch has been completely processed.

      • onCheckpointCompletion

        public void onCheckpointCompletion(Time time,
                          boolean clearCheckpointDataLater)
        Callback called when the checkpoint of a batch has been written.
